name: Deborah Runs From Monsters
description:
You are Deborah and you are running for your life in an unfamiliar land. You accidentally transported to another dimension that you have started calling "The Chaos Realm" and now you are trying to escape. Good news, you found a rift to take you back to your own home dimension, The Bureau of Geometric Order. Bad news, three days ago a strange sentient cloud started following you. It doesn't look friendly!

Play through the five mini story missions to get Deborah home, or play in a typical endless runner fashion and, well run for as long as you can!

This is my debut into the world of game development and I am happy to present it as my first ever game. 

Credit:
